name: Factory Floor @ Future Jam
description:
Game Prototype Entry @ Future Jam

Try to bring the boxes from one side of the screen to the other. Use the UI sliders and toggles to control the three arms to move the boxes.

Made in a couple of hours (:

Here's the YouTube presentation of the idea:

Future Jam info: kulturforum-zagreb.org/event/future-jam-2023/

Credits:

Music: Ay Carmela (instrumental)

Sound: https://mathias-wenzel.itch.io/factory-sound-samples

Art: https://rumblecade.itch.io/robo-factory-1-b

UI: https://gowldev.itch.io/ui-buttons-scrolling-bars-pixel-art

Font: https://www.dafont.com/future-socialism.font
